name: Tiny FarmLand
description:
(Note: Highly recommend to play on downloadable exe)

Made in 48 hours for LudumDare #52 Compo Jam.
-> I have a limited time so i couldn't make a tutorial but you would check out the "How to Play" section below to learn how to play.

USED TOOLS:

  • GameMaker
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity / ChipTone / Bfxr

CONTROLLERS:

  • Schema 1:
    • W/A/S/D
    • Space
    • Left Shift
    • K / MOUSE 1
  • Schema 2:
    • Arrow Keys
    • Z
    • X
    • C

HOW TO PLAY?

Our main goal is to feed the worms on both sides of the map. For this, firstly, we must produce bread from the wheat we harvest.

Watch out! if the worms get too hungry, they will start to get angry. And that means the end of the game. You have to feed them constantly.

Besides, you're not the only one who needs wheat. Slimes also consume wheat as food. That's why you must drive them out of your field. But don't be afraid. they won't hurt you. All they want is some food.
